siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
blogPost.body: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
blogPost.title: final - Real time feedback for your video and audio files.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: final 让您可以轻松地对您的视频和音频文件进行反馈和接收。它用时间戳标记所有的评论，这样你就可以准确地知道在哪里进行修改。你的项目反馈会被存储在一个地方，你再也不用浏览大量的电子邮件了。
localize.tagline: 对您的视频和音频文件进行实时反馈。

localize.description: final 讓您可以輕鬆地對您的視頻和音頻文件進行反饋和接收。它用時間戳標記所有的評論，這樣你就可以準確地知道在哪裏進行修改。你的項目反饋會被存儲在一個地方，你再也不用瀏覽大量的電子郵件了。
localize.tagline: 對您的視頻和音頻文件進行實時反饋。

previous.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
previous.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。

next.excerpt: Bunnyshell is a self-service DevOps automation platform that helps teams cut downtime and deliver reliable applications and services at high velocity.
next.title: Bunnyshell - Self-service DevOps automation for any application

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一个自助式的DevOps自动化平台，可以帮助团队缩短停机时间，并高速交付可靠的应用程序和服务。
localize.tagline: 针对任何应用的自助式DevOps自动化

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一個自助式的DevOps自動化平臺，可以幫助團隊縮短停機時間，並高速交付可靠的應用程序和服務。
localize.tagline: 針對任何應用的自助式DevOps自動化
